attributes.action: prevent banks from charging fixed daily rates for overdrafts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Honourable Prime minister


       26th October 2009

Dear Sir

I was shocked when I began to realise the implications of the new bank charges.


My business account has an ovedraft facility of £10,000, which is and
relied on for running my small business. I am always using this and average £5-10,000 at all times.  Currently this will cost under £200 pa
With the new fees that will be £730, g and if i should go over my limit, this can be much more. Not much help to a small business.

My wife has a £100facility.  If she uses this, say £20 at the beginning of the month,by the time she receives her statement she will have clocked up a charge of £40...... 200% in a month.

My daughter also has a £100 overdraft facility.  If she went over the limit, by £20, without noticing at the start of the month,  she will be fined £200 an amount she will not be able to pay. By the end of the year this will have risen to nearly £2,000.
If this is not a loan shark tell me what is.

Clever people these bankers......    No Not clever...evil. wicked people
These new ‘FEES’ are greed gone mad.  Can Government allow this?

On behalf of all decent people who struggle to make ends meet,
PLEASE do not allow this new charge.

Yours sincerely


B Scott
